utterance.speaker: KATE BECKETT
utterance.content: What are you doing in an alley, Jason?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey. How’s Chicago?

utterance.speaker: RICHARD CASTLE
utterance.content: Great. So guess what happened?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You were kicked out of the hotel for throwing a crazy party?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Those were the days. No, they moved the rest of the dates for the Derrick Storm book tour until after the wedding. You know what that means? I’m coming home.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Try to contain your excitement.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m sorry. That was lack of sleep, not lack of enthusiasm. I just – I was working on our project.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You went out? Alone? You know how dangerous this is.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. I was careful. And I didn’t have a choice. Jason Marks came back to town. He got picked up on 12th Street by a black towncar for a late night meet.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: With whom?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t know. I backed off. See? I was being responsible.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, being responsible means taking backup. Maybe it’s time we brought Ryan and Esposito into the loop on this.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, I’m not putting their careers at risk, too. Hey, that’s work. I’ve got to go. Listen, have a safe flight, okay? I love you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah well, you better. It’s two weeks until the wedding and it’s too late to return the tux.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Beckett.

utterance.speaker: KEVIN RYAN
utterance.content: Street sweeper found the body, called it in around 5AM.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did the victim have a wallet?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, his name is Jason Marks.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: According to the business card in his wallet, he runs a political consulting firm on Case Street in DC. Hey, you okay?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, fine. So did the firm say what he was doing in town?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: No, no, not yet. I left a message. Still haven’t heard back yet.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So he was shot?

utterance.speaker: LANIE PARISH
utterance.content: Double tap to the chest. At close range, too.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: At what time?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: I’m guessing between 12 and 2AM.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There’s not a lot of blood so he must have been killed someplace else.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Mmhmm. Then they brought his body here and dumped it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Ryan, were there any witnesses? Anyone that saw a car driving away?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Not yet. But I just started the canvass.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay. Let’s take a look at the traffic cams. See if we can figure out who else was in this alleyway.

utterance.speaker: JAVIER ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Actually, I’m already on that. I’ve been up and down 17th Street. There’s no cameras. But I’m pulling all traffic video in a two block radius.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You know what? Um … why don’t we extend that to a five block radius?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Five? We usually only do two.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. Uh … you know, just call it a hunch.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’ll see you guys at the precinct. I have to go and take care of something.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Damn it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This is Richard Castle. Leave me a message.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey Castle, you’re probably still in the air. Listen, when you land, come straight to the precinct. Something’s happened.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hey Beckett? You good?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. Hey, um … did you get anything from Jason Marks’s office?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah. They had no idea that he was in town. Neither did his family. Whatever he was doing here he was keeping it on the down low. But we did find out that Marks was staying at a hotel in Midtown. We’re checking to see whether he had any guests or made any phone calls while he was there.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I just found something a whole lot hotter than that. I pulled footage from a five block radius like you asked. Turned out to be a hell of a hunch. A camera off 12th caught Marks in a towncar. Look who’s driving.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Vulcan Simmons.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: If this picture was taken five blocks from the crime scene at 1:16AM it means that Marks was probably killed just a few minutes later. Maybe there’s some other video of Vulcan pulling the trigger.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: There isn’t. I was able to track him to 15th Street but there’s no coverage after that.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What’s a drug lord like Vulcan Simmons doing mixed up with a DC political consultant anyway?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Six weeks, Castle. Six weeks following Vulcan Simmons, hoping for a lead. And when we finally find someone that connects him to Bracken the guy ends up dead in an alley?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: If Jason Marks is the conduit between Vulcan’s drug money and Senator Bracken’s presidential campaign, why would they kill him?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Something’s changed. Maybe Bracken’s firewalling himself again. Erasing all of the dots before they connect back to him. We have to move fast, before those dots disappear.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. We talked about this. No unnecessary risks.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m not going to stand by while my mother’s murderer becomes president of the United States.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe you won’t have to. We’ve been looking at Marks’s death like it’s a setback. What if it’s the breakthrough we need?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Vulcan Simmons just became the prime suspect in a murder investigation. You’ve been given an all-access pass to his life. We play our cards right, you nail him with this?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He might roll on Bracken.

utterance.speaker: CAPTAIN VICTORIA GATES
utterance.content: Detective? My office, please.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No sir, you can’t do this. You can’t take me off this case. Nobody knows Vulcan Simmons like I do.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: And nobody has a history with him like you do. His lawyers will spin it as a personal vendetta. Now, Mr. Simmons is being brought in for questioning and it’s best that you’re not here when he shows up.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Sir, I need to be a part of this case.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: I know. But you can’t be. Take the rest of the day off, Detective. That’s an order.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: This car’s the key. If that’s where Vulcan killed Marks then we’ll find the forensic evidence in it. He’ll have no choice but to cut a deal and give up Bracken. It’s just that we’re so close, Castle. I can feel it. But we need to find that car.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ryan and Esposito are all over this. You know that, right?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s the precinct. Hey. How’d it go?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We had to cut Vulcan loose.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What? What happened?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: His lawyers are claiming that it’s not him in that photo. And since Vulcan doesn’t have any vehicles registered to his name we can’t prove that it is.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Ryan, listen to me. You have to seize that town car before he gets rid of all of the evidence of the murder.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Well, we would if we could. But the man has no paper trail. We can’t even figure out where he lives, let alone where he keeps that car.

utterance.speaker: VULCAN SIMMONS
utterance.content: Get a girl’s hair wet and they never let it go.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: You are not going to shoot me, Detective.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No? Then take another step!

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: Me lying dead? You here trespassing? With that big old grudge you carry? What are your bosses going to say to that?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You killed Jason Marks and the blood in the car is going to prove it.

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: Well then, it’s a good thing you have a warrant. You do have a warrant, don’t you, Detective? Oh, now, see, that’s a shame. Because now all that evidence has become fruit of the poison tree. My lawyers and I thank you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who do you work for?

utterance.speaker: SIMMONS
utterance.content: You lost this round, Detective. Now run along.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Not until I get some answers.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, hello?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yo, it’s Espo. Is Beckett with you?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Um … what’s going on?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well, Gates is putting her back on the Vulcan Simmons investigation.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She is? I thought she didn’t want Beckett going toe-to-toe with him?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: That’s not going to be an issue anymore. Vulcan Simmons has been murdered.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey. Where were you this morning?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Not now.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What do we think happened?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Someone tortured the man.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Based on blood patterns he was shot five times over the span of a half an hour or so. The killer started at the knees, then shoulders, the finally a fatal round through the heart.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: It seems like the shooter may have interrogated him, inflicting pain to get information, perhaps.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What about forensic evidence?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Not much to go on. Our killer was careful. Picked up the spent shell casings.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How about ballistics.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: It doesn’t look like I’ll be able to recover the bullets.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Because they’re too damaged.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Because they’re gone. Whoever did this dug them out of the body.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: In other words, the killer knew what we’d look for and covered their tracks. You know Vulcan’s world. Any idea who might have done this?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, sir. Do we have any witnesses?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Not that we’ve found so far. But we did find the car Mr. Simmons was driving. And there’s blood inside, most likely from Jason Marks. I’ll show you.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hey Castle? Got a sec?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What’s up?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We were just canvassing and we spoke to a witness who said they saw someone here last night.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: A woman sneaking onto the property. Witness described her as a tall brunette, too good looking to be in this neighborhood.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes, I was there. But I didn’t kill him. I thought about it, though.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What the hell, Kate? We had a deal. Why didn’t you tell me?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I knew you wouldn’t let me go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You’re damn right I wouldn’t! It was reckless.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It was a calculated risk. I couldn’t let Vulcan slip away. Only I didn’t move fast enough.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So what happened last night?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He was in the shadows, he was waiting. It’s like he knew I was coming. And we had words. That’s it. He was alive when I left.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And you didn’t see anyone else?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. Just him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate, you absolutely cannot tell anyone you were at that garage.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Who are they?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The guy in the front is Captain Donovan. He’s Internal Affairs. He took over after Gates transferred here. What’s he doing here? Lanie. Hey.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Kate, we have a problem.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What’s wrong?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: I found a bullet in Vulcan’s body, lodged in his spine. A .40 caliber. The killer must have missed it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How is that a problem? If ballistics gets a match, then –

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Ballistics did get a match. The bullet came from a pistol that was registered to you. Kate, Vulcan Simmons was killed with your gun.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How could it be from your gun? You have your gun.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s my backup piece. I have a .40 cal in my safe at home.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You’re being set up.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: I see what the ballistics report says, Marcus, but it’s wrong. Detective Beckett would never do anything like this.

utterance.speaker: MARCUS DONOVAN
utterance.content: This isn’t a debate, Victoria. I’m just giving you a heads up because we have history. Now, where is she?

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: Cover the other doors.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: You’re making a mistake, Marcus. Something else is going on.

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: It doesn’t matter. I have my orders.

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: Where’s Detective Beckett?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I have no idea.

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: Lock down the precinct. Make sure she does not leave this building!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m telling you, I don’t know where she went.

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: You were just in the break room with Detective Beckett. What did she say to you before she fled?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That she didn’t kill Vulcan Simmons.

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: Do you understand this woman is now the target of a manhunt? That she’s most likely a murderer?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I can’t help you.

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: I want him gone. He has no business in this precinct. Not while we’re conducting this investigation.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: I’m afraid he’s right, Mr. Castle. You’re going to have to leave.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Gladly.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: LT. Follow us a minute.

utterance.speaker: LT
utterance.content: Make it fast.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What’s this all about, Castle?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Guys, she wouldn’t want you involved.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We’re already involved. We’re family, bro.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We know this is bigger than Vulcan Simmons.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We canvassed around the hotel where Jason Marks was staying. The golf captain there said he had a meeting with this man. Look familiar?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah. That’s Smith.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Captain Montgomery’s friend, right? The one who kept Beckett safe by holding those files on Bracken?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Until they got blown to high heaven.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, but Smith is dead. He died in the hospital.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Maybe that’s just how he wanted it to look.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Smith did have the resources to fake his own death. And that is the only way that Bracken would stop hunting him.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Bracken? Is that what this is all about?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We believe Vulcan’s drug money was funding his campaign. We were trying to find a link, but maybe we got too close.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well how does Smith fit in?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t know. But if he took the risk of showing himself something big must be going on.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Between the cops and Bracken’s guys Beckett’s right in the crosshairs.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What can we do?

utterance.speaker: LT
utterance.content: Guys, we’ve gotta go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’ll let you know.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey. You okay?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. Were you followed?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, no. No. I switched cabs three times just to be sure. Donovan’s gotta have the force looking for you. For the couple that has everything. Two matching burner phones, GPS turned, of course.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Listen, Castle, I can’t ask you to stick around anymore.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You don’t have to ask. I’m volunteering.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. it’s too dangerous. Bracken knows that I was bluffing now. That I don’t have this huge file of evidence against him. Because if I did I wouldn’t have to go after Vulcan to bring him down. I’ve overplayed my hand. There’s nothing to stop him from killing me anymore, so … he’s making his move. And I have to make mine. I called his office in DC. Bracken’s in New York.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So … what’s your plan? You’re going to take a run at him with nothing?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What’s my other option? Hide in the shadows and wait for them to arrest me? Two days later I’ll end up hanging in my jail cell. Rogue cop commits suicide.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Maybe there’s another way.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I pulled the death certificate for Michael Smith from Stuyvesant Hospital. It’s signed by a Doctor Oliver Pressing. He’s a legit doctor in good standing.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Someone above reproach. A excellent candidate to help you fake your death. Did you find any other connections between Dr. Pressing and Smith?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: As – – as a matter of fact, I did.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Dr. Pressing? NYPD. We need to ask you a few questions.

utterance.speaker: OLIVER PRESSING
utterance.content: I don’t have much time. I’m about to start my rounds.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Uh … we understand you belong to the Magellan Yacht Club. As a matter of fact, you are a member of the board.

utterance.speaker: PRESSING
utterance.content: Was there a problem at the club?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you know Michael Smith?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It seems that you would, since he was also a board member.

utterance.speaker: PRESSING
utterance.content: Well I was acquainted with Mr. Smith until he passed away. Excuse me, I’m a little confused. What’s the nature of your inquiry?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’re looking for him.

utterance.speaker: PRESSING
utterance.content: Well like I told you, he’s deceased.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Doctor, you helped him disappear.

utterance.speaker: PRESSING
utterance.content: That’s absurd. I signed his death certificate because he was dead.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Please, we just need to reach him. We know that he’s in town. You helped him because you knew that he was in danger and we’re in the same danger now.

utterance.speaker: PRESSING
utterance.content: I’m sorry. You’re wasting your time and mine.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Doctor, we can make a lot more noise. Is that what you want? Is that what he wants?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, we’ve gotta go.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: My picture shouldn’t be on the news. Not for this. Not this fast.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Bracken?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. We’ve gotta get the hell out of here. Castle, stairwell.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Wait. That’s my phone. My burner phone.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How did someone –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I have no idea. Hello?

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: I understand you’re looking for me, Mr. Castle. Meet me in the usual place. 20 minutes.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s Smith. Let’s go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He’s late.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Maybe he changed his mind. Got spooked.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This guy doesn’t spook.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you really think he can help us?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He has before.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: That’s close enough. I’ve gone to great lengths to stay alive. I’d like to stay that way.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And yet you came back.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: I can survive in the shadows, I just don’t want to live there forever.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You need to take Bracken down, same as we do.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There has to be a way.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: Yes, and I thought I’d found it. I got to one of Bracken’s men, who told me there was something that the Senator was afraid of. A recording made by a former associate to protect himself. A recording in which Bracken admits to murder.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you know where it is?

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: No, and neither does Bracken, though he’s spent considerable resources trying to recover it, as did I, for over a year with no luck. Hell, it may not even exist. But in my search I did make a contact. A consultant in Bracken’s organization and he promised that he could expose Bracken’s finances as corrupt. But it got him killed.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Jason Marks.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: Yes. I was close to bringing him into the fold but they must have found out, which made him a liability.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There’s got to be a better way to get to Bracken.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: There isn’t. I just have to start again.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’ve been tracking Vulcan’s network. Maybe we can help.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: Detective, you are radioactive. You can’t even help yourself.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: Don’t try to contact me again.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Smith! There must be something we can do.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: Run. Disappear. Because if you don’t, he will kill you.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: She’s all over the news. Have you heard anything from them? Calls? Texts?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Not since this afternoon. And we can’t make a move until we know where they are.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Gentlemen.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Is there something going on here that I should know about?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Beckett’s not a killer, I know that. But she’s going to go down for this open and shut unless I can protect her. And I can’t do that if I’m left in the dark. So if she’s being set up? I need to know why.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Sir, how much do you know about Beckett’s mother’s murder?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: It’s a random stabbing. Never solved.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: There’s a lot more to it than that.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Tell me everything.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The fugitive suite. The best room that cash and no ID can buy.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’ve gotta take the fight to Bracken.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: By looking for a mythical tape that no one can find? No, Smith was right. Once we change your look we get out of town.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You know, Castle, my mom had a saying. Vincit Omnia Veritas.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Truth conquers all.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’ll never find the truth if we run away.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate, we’re never going to find the truth if we’re dead. We’re not running away. We’re surviving, okay? We’re living to fight another day. We will take down Bracken. First we’re going to find a safe place and come up with a plan. I’ve got a friend, he will give us a car. No questions asked.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay. Go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’ll be back. We’ll be back.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle?

utterance.speaker: SENATOR WILLIAM BRACKEN
utterance.content: Hello Detective.

utterance.speaker: THOMAS
utterance.content: Don’t even think about it.

utterance.speaker: SERGIO
utterance.content: Drop the scissors.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: We had an agreement. A truce. Live and let live. I held up my end of the bargain, I even saved your life.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And that makes up for what you took from me?

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: What about what I gave to you? Everything you are, everything you’ve accomplished, is because of me.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Is how you justify murder? It builds character? Then why don’t you give me a chance to build yours?

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: You had a future. Why couldn’t you just let this go and move on so I could do the same?

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: So I guess there’s no point in asking for your vote, is there?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re not going to be on the ballot. A presidential campaign financed by drug money with a trail of dead bodies, there’s no hole big enough to bury all of that.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: I’ve gotta tell you, part of me really admires your - your moral certitude, the way you fight for what you believe in even knowing it’s going to destroy you. But the part of me that admires you is not the part that makes tough decisions.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Fine. Then kill me. Do it. Pull the trigger.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: I have people for that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t want them. I want you. Do it. Now. Or don’t you have the balls?

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: And create physical evidence linking me to the crime scene? We both know I’m smarter than that. Goodbye Kate.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The truth is going to come out.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: There is no truth. Not anymore.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: THOMAS
utterance.content: Open her mouth.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What was in that pill?

utterance.speaker: THOMAS
utterance.content: Something to relax you. Now we’re going to take a little drink.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Is there any proof that Bracken did these things?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Not anymore. Montgomery had a file, but it’s gone now.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Sir, we need to help her.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: No evidence, against one of the most powerful men in the country. I don’t think we can.

utterance.speaker: THOMAS
utterance.content: Get the gun. She’s wasted.

utterance.speaker: THOMAS
utterance.content: Relax. It’s almost over.

utterance.speaker: THOMAS
utterance.content: Let’s get your finger in there.

utterance.speaker: THOMAS
utterance.content: Good.

utterance.speaker: SMITH
utterance.content: - told me there was something that the Senator was afraid of. A recording made by a former associate. A recording in which Bracken admits to murder.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: When you walked into the Twelfth I felt the hand of God. I knew he was giving me another chance and I thought, if I could protect you the way I should have protected her.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re Montgomery. I mean, Captain Montgomery.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Do I know you, Officer … … Beckett?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. No, sir. I just – I’ve always wanted to do what you do. I wanted to be in homicide.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Is that right? What are you doing now?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Patrol.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: I can see that. But what are you doing in the archives?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m sorry, sir. I didn’t – I didn’t mean to be here. I know I shouldn’t be. But I - I was looking into a case. My mom’s homicide.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Johanna Beckett.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did you know her?

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: I know her case is unsolved. And you were reviewing the files to see if they might have missed something?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes, sir.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: If the case is unsolved, chances are the answers aren’t in that file.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: What did your mother do, Officer Beckett?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: She was a lawyer.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: And you think her death might have had something to do with a case she was handling?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well the detective that was working her case, Raglan, said that it was just random, but –

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Well did you look though her personal belongings? Old notebooks, journals, diaries? Cassette recordings? Stuff like that?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes, sir. Tons of times. But I haven’t found anything that seems relevant.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Well keep looking. You never know when something might turn up.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Nice meeting you, Officer Beckett.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Sorry about your mom.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you, sir.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How are you feeling?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where are we?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Ripton, Vermont. Population 588. In a couple of shirt hours we will be crossing into Canada.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Turn around. We have to go back.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It was Montgomery. He made that recording of Bracken. The one that Smith has been looking for.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Captain Montgomery? How could you possibly know that?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, when I first met him he was saying things about my mother’s murder, things that I didn’t understand at the time. But he specifically mentioned a cassette recording.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And Smith said that the person who made that recording was a former associate of Bracken’s.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. It adds up.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, but if Montgomery did have that kind of evidence why wouldn’t he have just given it to Smith?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I think he gave it to my mom. He asked if I had been through her belongings. If I came across a cassette.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate, if he gave her the tape you would have found it. You’ve been through her things a thousand times.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, I didn’t know what I was looking for. The answer is there. I know it. I have a box of her things in my apartment. We’ve got to go back.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s crazy. They’ll be staking out your place.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Not Bracken’s guys. Not now.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And how about Donovan’s guys? He’ll have cops up there. There’s no way we’re getting near that place.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We will. We just need a little help.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hey guys. It’s your lucky day. Donovan sent us over so you can grab a bite to eat.

utterance.speaker: UNIFORM
utterance.content: We’re not supposed to take lunch for another hour.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Oh, I’m sorry. Is this not a good time for you? So what, we should just wait here until you guys get hungry?

utterance.speaker: UNIFORM
utterance.content: All right. We’ll grab a slice and be back in a few.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You guys have got about two minutes.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, Montgomery gave her the tape she would have written something down about it. I kept some of her notebooks in here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Damn it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Her appointment book. What is this, some kind of shorthand?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Uh, yeah. She developed a code when she was in law school in case anyone subpoenaed her notes.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s ingenious.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Except she was the only one who knew what it meant. I gave it to contacts in the NSA, the FBI, military intelligence – no one was able to decipher it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This is the day she died. There’s gotta be something in here about that case.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah well, we don’t have time to figure it out. Come on, Castle. We gotta go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey, look at this last entry. “D Me w/Family”.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Dinner with family. She was on her way to the restaurant to meet us the night that she was killed.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Look how close the D is to the M. DM?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Detective Montgomery?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: E? Evidence? Detective Montgomery evidence?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you think that –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I do. With family. She was bringing the tape to you. Maybe to give it to your father for safekeeping.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Which means she would have had it on her when she was killed. Bracken would have recovered that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Only we know he didn’t. Otherwise he wouldn’t still be looking for it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So what did she do with the tape?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You guys, I’m so sorry.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Please. We’re the ones who screwed up.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We led them right to you.

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: Keep them here ‘til I get back. I want to personally escort them to booking.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Shh. It’s not your fault.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I really thought we were going to make it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey. Whatever happens.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle. The elephants.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t understand.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: They were my mom’s. Before they were on my desk she used to keep them on hers. She used to joke about how they were like a family, just like us. Me, my mom, my dad. They were a family.

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: Detective Beckett! Step back, Detective! Do it, now!

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: Show me your hands!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, wait!

utterance.speaker: DONOVAN
utterance.content: Put it down! Drop it, now!

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Raglan, shut the door. You’ve got a lot of balls, coming here.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Is that –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Senator Bracken. Back when he was still Assistant DA.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Look, we just want to make sure we’re all on the same page.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And that’s Montgomery.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: You took us for a lot of money, Bracken. We want assurances.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Hey, be happy I haven’t busted the three of you for your little mafia extortion ring.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Whoa, relax.

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: No, no. You want assurances? Here you go. I assure you that as easily as I pinned Bob Armen’s murder on Pulgatti I can just as easily pin it on the cops that actually did the deed.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Bracken just admitted to blackmail.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: Pulgatti knows he’s been framed. What if someone gets on to this?

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Then I’ll handle them.

utterance.speaker: MONTGOMERY
utterance.content: You? How?

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: I know people, Roy. Dangerous people. Anyone gets to close, like that b*tch lawyer Johanna Beckett has been poking around, I’ll have them killed. I’ve had people killed before.

utterance.speaker: REPORTER LINDA
utterance.content: Senator, why do you want to be president?

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: Well it’s simple, Linda. I’m tired. The backroom deals, the corruption, the waste? I’m exhausted, frankly, and I know the American people are, too. Look, this country deserves a leader who won’t back – – who – who won’t fight - back down from a fight. Who has a proven record of taking on of special interests and believes a government can still be a force for good. These are the – I’m … I’m sorry. I’m – I’m going to have to cut this short.

utterance.speaker: REPORTER LINDA
utterance.content: Senator, is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: BRACKEN
utterance.content: You can’t – you can’t be here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I found the tape. I found it. It’s over. Senator Bracken, you are under arrest for conspiracy, fraud, and the murder of my mother, Johanna Beckett.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Turn around, please.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We’ll take it from here.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’s been a long time coming, Bracken.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’s proud of you. Wherever she is, she’s proud.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I never could have done this without you.

utterance.speaker: THE END
utterance.content: CASTLE
